languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Single shot{/g} that poisons enemy with Viral {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} if it fails {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [to delete] Single shot that poisons enemy with Viral Toxin on hit for 3 rounds if it fails Toughness test.
